flowchart LR
    subgraph build_app["Build App"]
        build_app_step0["Compile app"]
    end
    subgraph test_app["Test App"]
        test_app_step0["Test app"]
    end
    subgraph build_lib["Build Lib"]
        build_lib_step0["Compile lib"]
    end
    subgraph test_lib["Test Lib"]
        test_lib_step0["Test lib"]
    end

    build_app --> test_app
    build_lib --> test_lib
